report.title: NPMS core square plots taxa by plot
report.query: SELECT lp.name as plot, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common, count(cof.id) as records from cache_occurrences_functional cof JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on cof.sample_id = csf.id JOIN locations l on l.id = csf.location_id JOIN locations lp on lp.id = l.parent_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id = cof.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id WHERE lp.location_type_id = 4009 and lp.name = '#gr#' group by lp.name, cttl.preferred_taxon, cttl.default_common_name UNION SELECT l.name as plot, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common, count(cof.id) as records from cache_occurrences_functional cof JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on cof.sample_id = csf.id JOIN locations l on l.id = csf.location_id JOIN locations lp on lp.id = l.parent_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id = cof.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id WHERE lp.location_type_id = 4009 and lp.name = '#gr#' group by l.name, cttl.preferred_taxon, cttl.default_common_name order by plot, records desc

param.name: gr
param.description: Monad grid ref of core square
